Converse's Campus Safety Officers are on the ball! The officers are constantly patrolling. They hand out their number and urge you to call whenever you need them. If it is late at night and you can't find a parking spot close to your dorm, with one call, they will pick you up and escort you to the door.
No Fraternities or Sororities. We are all one big united Sonority.
No matter who you are, where you are from, or what you like Converse has a club for that, and if they don't the faculty and staff urge you to start your own!
Fine arts students will love converse, along with anyone looking for diverse leadership opportunities.

We are located across the street from an old grave yard, lots of spooky stories originate there. Converse has no Fraternities or Sororities, because we are all one big Sorority together. We even have a school-wide Big Sister/Little Sister event, just like normal Sororities do.

The more you get involved the more Bang for the buck you will receive. If you sit in your dorm all week, you will never get to experience all of the great facilities, events, and trips Converse has to offer.

Movie nights in the dorm with friends are so much fun. We also like to go to sporting events. But, sometimes you want to just get off campus: Converse is conveniently located on Main Street in Spartanburg, SC. So there are plenty of places to go within walking distance.
Converse dining is very nice for the most part. You can find problems at any place you eat in the world, but Converse tries their best to provide as many options at every meal as possible.

Dorms are old, but very comfortable. Housekeeping cleans the bathrooms daily, even on weekends. They have great dorm rules in which there are quiet hours. During those hours there is to be no excessive noise, allowing students to study in comfortably quiet environment.

Classes are easy if you utilize all of the available resources. Converse provides free tutoring for every subject, every Professor has office hours, and some professors even give out their personal phone numbers for your assistance.

Get a sturdy laundry basket. Work hard before you play hard. Make friends not enemies. Step out of your comfort zone. Communicate constantly with your professors, get to know them, because one day you will need them as a reference.
Converse is a family-like community. Converse is bursting at the seams with great opportunities. Converse is a new home away from home.
